animeTitle: My Master is Just a Supreme Golden Immortal
otherNames: 我的师父不过是个大罗金仙, My Master is Just a Supreme Golden Immortal, My Master is Just an Immortal, My master is just a Daluo Jinxian, My master is nothing more than a Da Luo Golden Immortal
synopsis: At the moment when the protagonist, Yang Fan, was on the brink of death, he accidentally triggered the seal of the Heaven and Earth Gourd, unintentionally releasing the primordial spirit of an ancient Da Luo Golden Immortal. By a twist of fate, the two formed a master-disciple contract, each fulfilling their own needs. With a powerful being as his master, Yang Fan eagerly absorbed the ancient inheritance, transforming his abilities and growing from an insignificant, impoverished young man into a formidable figure of his time. Following his master’s orders, Yang Fan widely recruited disciples and spread the teachings, eventually building his own force. He not only became a revered grandmaster but also followed in his master’s footsteps, embarking on a new path of destiny.
